title: Teleporter
summaries: The Teleporter is a travel mechanism purchased from the (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) Mechanic / (Old-gen console and 3DS versions) Steampunker for 2 GC50 SC. When two Teleporters are wired together with a triggering mechanism, they can exchange players, NPCs, and most enemies between them. Teleporting is always instantaneous, has no load time or cooldown, no Mana or coin cost, and no limit on distance.

Unlike most <linked>furniture</linked>, Teleporters are <linked>foreground objects</linked>. They consist of three inseparable <linked>blocks</linked> which, like all block types, can individually be shaped with a <linked>hammer</linked> or <linked>actuated</linked>.

statistics.Buy: 2 GC50 SC
statistics.Sell: 50 SC
